title: Important GST Update: ICAI Releases Revised Handbook on Interest, Late Fee & Penalties (December 2025)
content:
# Important GST Update: ICAI Releases Revised Handbook on Interest, Late Fee & Penalties (December 2025)

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne "Handbook on Interest, Late Fee & Penalties under GST" ka revised edition release kiya hai, dated December 23, 2025. Yeh handbook accounting aur finance professionals ke liye ek updated reference material provide karta hai, especially considering the dynamic nature of the Goods and Services Tax (GST) regime.

**Key Highlights of this Update:**

*   **Comprehensive Coverage:** This 130-page handbook is structured into three chapters covering Interest, Late Fees, and Penalties under GST.
*   **Updated Legal Provisions:** It incorporates the latest statutory amendments and clarifications issued by the Government up to December 5, 2025.
*   **Interest Provisions:** Detailed guidance is provided on interest under Section 50 of the CGST Act, 2017, including computation mechanisms under Rule 88B. Special emphasis is given to interest on delayed tax payments (charged only on net cash liability in most cases, with exceptions) and interest on wrongly availed and utilised ITC (now uniformly 18%).
*   **Late Fee & Penalties:** The handbook consolidates updated provisions and system-based enforcement mechanisms related to late fees for delayed filing of returns (Section 47) and various penal provisions under Sections 73, 74, and 128A (waiver of interest/penalty for FY 2017â€“2020 in eligible cases).
*   **Practical Guidance:** It includes extensive illustrations, judicial references (like Madras HC, Telangana HC), and GST Council decisions to enhance clarity.

This revised edition aims to help CAs, tax professionals, and businesses navigate the complex GST ecosystem more effectively, especially with increasing technology-driven scrutiny and automation in compliance processes.
